name: Gana-Beaubourg
profile:
n 1995, Galerie Gana-Beaubourg opened in the Marais area of Paris, the heart of the Parisian gallery district.Its unique mission is to introduce Korean art to international communities, while simultaneously advocating for the universality of art.
A number of talented Korean artists have been discovered internationally, and later have been able to develop their skills in Europe. However, the gallery does not only represent Korean artists.Since its creation, exceptional artists such as Robert Longo, Enzo Cucchi and Andy Warhol have been represented at the gallery reminders of its continued desire to create dynamic cultural exchanges between the East and the West.
